author: ngdevelop-tech
message:
docs(core): fix directive.ts preserving whitespace example comment (#37377)

In directive.ts file - component preserving whitespace example's compiled output comment is wrongly written

PR Close #37377

files.patch: @@ -424,17 +424,17 @@ export interface ComponentDecorator { * * ```html * Spaces&ngsp;between&ngsp;links. - * compiled to be equivalent to: - * Spaces between links. + * * ``` * * Note that sequences of `&ngsp;` are still collapsed to just one space character when * the `preserveWhitespaces` option is set to `false`. * * ```html * before&ngsp;&ngsp;&ngsp;after - * compiled to be equivalent to: - * Spaces between links. + * * ``` * * To preserve sequences of whitespace characters, use the
